item.title: Feedback is Deeper Than You Think – Dev Leader Weekly 45
item.description: The post Feedback is Deeper Than You Think – Dev Leader Weekly 45 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss why feedback is important at all levels of engineering AND how it works two ways. The post Feedback is Deeper Than You Think – Dev Leader Weekly 45 appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/05/25/feedback-is-deeper-than-you-think-dev-leader-weekly-45/

item.title: Dapper And Strongly Typed IDs – How To Dynamically Register Mappings
item.description: The post Dapper And Strongly Typed IDs – How To Dynamically Register Mappings appeared first on Dev Leader.How can we use Dapper and strongly typed IDs from the StronglyTypedId package? Let's see if we can generalize the guidance from the original author! The post Dapper And Strongly Typed IDs – How To Dynamically Register Mappings appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/05/20/dapper-and-strongly-typed-ids-how-to-dynamically-register-mappings/

item.title: Developer Burnout – Dev Leader Weekly 44
item.description: The post Developer Burnout – Dev Leader Weekly 44 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly!
